attributes.action: legal aid re-instating for loving fathers denied access to their child/children
attributes.additional_details:
Money does not make a father! It is a disgrace that fathers can'tget fair legal representation in 2016 

Stopping legal aid is grossly unfair and gives far more power to women today who now know they have the upper hand on fathers,they know it will cost thousands in solicitors fees this is an absolute disgrace in my eyes.

As a father that is currently fighting to see my son and fight for justice i think i speak for all fathers who are fighting for their kids that legal aid needs re-instating.
attributes.background:
Fighting for legal aid for fathers like myself who have been denied access out of pure spite by game playing so called mothers.

Legal aid for loving fathers who want to see their children should mandatory, money does not determine a good father.
